name: Renjie Wan
content: Renjie Group Renjie Group At Renjie Group, we pursue the research topics that we find most inspiring and meaningful. We have several Ph.D. openings at this moment. If you want to work with us in the future, please feel free to drop us an email. All emails/CVs are carefully read and evaluated. Only matched candidates will be responded. Our Current Research Interests Digital Copyright Protection Neural Representation Image Processing AI Security Principal Investigator Renjie Wan Assistant Professor Department of Computer Science Hong Kong Baptist University Email:Â wanpeoplejie [at] gmail (dot) com Google Scholar / XiaoHongShu / HKBU Scholars / ORCiD Renjie Wan is an Assistant Professor at the Department of Computer Science of Hong Kong Baptist University. He obtained his Ph.D. degree from Nanyang Technological University in 2019. Before joining HKBU, he was a Wallenberg-NTU Presidential Postdoctoral Fellow of Nanyang Technological University from 2020 to 2022. Group Members Ph.D. Students Ziyuan Luo (Fall 2022) Qi Song (Fall 2023) Ruofei Wang (Fall 2023) Xiufeng Huang (Fall 2023) Haoliang Han (Fall 2024) Yingjie Lu (Fall 2025) Yangyi Zhao (Fall 2025)
